caption:
The photograph presents a dark and moody scene, primarily in shades of deep blue and black. The main focus is a small bird perched on a thin branch near the center of the image. The bird, appearing disheveled or fluffed up, is dimly lit, with only faint highlights delineating its form against the shadowy background.

The background is quite blurred and offers little detail, contributing to a sense of depth and isolation of the bird as the central subject. The atmosphere conveyed is serene and somewhat mysterious, emphasized by the low light conditions and the limited visibility of the surroundings. The sparse visibility of a few finer branches suggests a natural, outdoor setting, possibly during twilight or in a shaded area.

Overall, the composition uses minimal light and shadow to create a subtle contrast, focusing attention on the solitude and the subtle details of the bird's appearance.
title: A song sparrow (melospiza melodia) singing in the morning sunlight in a small clearing on the edge of the forest.  Private forest preserve on green mountain, Washington.  Near Seattle, Washington.  From the environmental protection agencys project documerica collection, "in praise of forests".  For additional images see fiche #s 209, 210, 211, 212, and 213.  Entheos.  Spring, 1974.
